attributes.action: Legalise cannabis so we can then get the money back In the growth of the economy
attributes.additional_details: There is evidence all over the world with most countries legalising it now it is time for the United Kingdom to do the same thing cannabis is proven to help with a lot of problems especially because lockdown happened people's mental health went downhill cannabis helped a lot of people through lockdown and the country why can't we get it legalised now. Alcohol kills more people in the UK than cannabis would ever even the fact that cannabis can help get England back out of debt.
attributes.background: A lot of people in United Kingdom are smoking cannabis every day and it is getting to the point where people are fed up with the government not doing their job properly so why don't we do it now before it's too late and legalise cannabis so we can get the country back with money on taxing  marijuana
